name: Gods and Nemesis: of Ghosts from Dragons
description: Bizarre lands! Fantasy! Chaos! You start off with the main chapter centered in the bizarre alien land as described in the book Gods and Nemesis: Leviathan Seed. Additional chapters will be added allowing you to advance your character.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8.1 /10 Processor: 1.7 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB RAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Additional Notes: 4 GB Available Space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8.1 /10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB RAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Additional Notes: 4 GB Available Space
